Title: The Raw and the Crooked
Plot: Hank proposes to Karen right before a dinner party, to which Mia, Charlie, Marcy, Lew Ashby, Sonja and Julian are invited. Drugs and special circumstances turn the evening in an unexpected direction.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Paula Marshall
